segments.text: Oh , Sam ! Is this your dog ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's Cindy , you know that . Hey , Cindy , say hello to Maria .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She is also very naughty . By the way , do you have a dog , Maria ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have a little white cat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , cats are always gentle . and they don't need a lot of space since they're small .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I think they're dull , aren't they ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not at all . They're quiet most of the time.But they can be every bit as affectionate as dogs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , cats are certainly more independent .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Absolutely . Believe it or not , I found my cat by a garbage can around my neighborhood two years ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: oh , really ? so you just took home a stray cat ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . It was starving and looking for something to eat when I saw it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now we get along very well . It makes me feel that I'm someone special .
segments.speaker: S1
